verses.verse: Then the prophets <WH5029>, Haggai <WH2292> the prophet <WH5029>, and Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148> the son <WH1247> of Iddo <WH5714>, prophesied <WH5013> <WH8724> unto <WH5922> the Jews <WH3062> that were in Y'hudah <WH3061> and Yerushalayim <WH3390> in the name <WH8036> of the 'Elohim <WH426> of Yisra'EL <WH3479>, even unto <WH5922> them.

Then <WH116> rose up <WH6966> <WH8754> Z'rubavel <WH2217> the son <WH1247> of Shealtiel <WH7598>, and Jeshua <WH3443> the son <WH1247> of Jozadak <WH3136>, and began <WH8271> <WH8745> to build <WH1124> <WH8749> the house <WH1005> of 'Elohim <WH426> which is at Yerushalayim <WH3390>: and with them <WH5974> were the prophets <WH5029> of 'Elohim <WH426> helping <WH5583> <WH8683> them.

At the same time <WH2166> came <WH858> <WH8754> to them Tatnai <WH8674>, governor <WH6347> on this side <WH5675> the river <WH5103>, and Shetharboznai <WH8370>, and their companions <WH3675>, and said <WH560> <WH8750> thus <WH3652> unto them <WH5922>, Who <WH4479> hath commanded <WH7761> <WH8754> <WH2942> you to build <WH1124> <WH8749> this <WH1836> house <WH1005>, and to make up <WH3635> <WH8805> this <WH1836> wall <WH846> ?

Then <WH116> said <WH560> <WH8754> we unto them after this manner <WH3660>, What <WH4479> are <WH581> the names <WH8036> of the men <WH1400> that make <WH1124> <WH8750> this <WH1836> building <WH1147> ?

But the eye <WH5870> of their 'Elohim <WH426> was <WH1934> <WH8754> upon <WH5922> the elders <WH7868> <WH8750> of the Jews <WH3062>, that they could not <WH3809> cause <WH989> them <WH1994> to cease <WH989> <WH8754>, till <WH5705> the matter <WH2941> came <WH1946> <WH8748> to Darius <WH1868>: and then <WH116> they returned answer <WH8421> <WH8681> by letter <WH5407> concerning <WH5922> this <WH1836> matter.

The copy <WH6573> of the letter <WH104> that Tatnai <WH8674>, governor <WH6347> on this side <WH5675> the river <WH5103>, and Shetharboznai <WH8370>, and his companions <WH3675> the Apharsachites <WH671>, which were on this side <WH5675> the river <WH5103>, sent <WH7972> <WH8754> unto <WH5922> Darius <WH1868> the king <WH4430>:
They sent <WH7972> <WH8754> a letter <WH6600> unto <WH5922> him, wherein <WH1459> was written <WH3790> <WH8752> thus <WH1836>; Unto Darius <WH1868> the king <WH4430>, all <WH3606> peace <WH8001>.

Be it known <WH1934> <WH8748> <WH3046> <WH8752> unto the king <WH4430>, that we went <WH236> <WH8754> into the province <WH4083> of Y'hudaha <WH3061>, to the house <WH1005> of the great <WH7229> 'Elohim <WH426>, which is builded <WH1124> <WH8732> with great <WH1560> stones <WH69>, and timber <WH636> is laid <WH7761> <WH8727> in the walls <WH3797>, and this <WH1791> work <WH5673> goeth <WH5648> <WH8727> fast <WH629> on, and prospereth <WH6744> <WH8683> in their hands <WH3028>.

Then <WH116> asked <WH7593> <WH8754> we those <WH479> elders <WH7868> <WH8750>, and said <WH560> <WH8754> unto them thus <WH3660>, Who <WH4479> commanded <WH7761> <WH8754> <WH2942> you to build <WH1124> <WH8749> this <WH1836> house <WH1005>, and to make up <WH3635> <WH8805> these <WH1836> walls <WH846> ?

We asked <WH7593> <WH8754> their names <WH8036> also <WH638>, to certify <WH3046> <WH8682> thee, that we might write <WH3790> <WH8748> the names <WH8036> of the men <WH1400> that were the chief <WH7217> of them.

And thus <WH3660> they returned <WH8421> <WH8684> us answer <WH6600>, saying <WH560> <WH8749>, We <WH586> are <WH1994> the servants <WH5649> of the 'Elohim <WH426> of heaven <WH8065> and earth <WH772>, and build <WH1124> <WH8750> the house <WH1005> that was <WH1934> <WH8754> builded <WH1124> <WH8752> these <WH1836> many <WH7690> years <WH8140> ago <WH6928>, which a great <WH7229> king <WH4430> of Yisra'EL <WH3479> builded <WH1124> <WH8754> and set up <WH3635> <WH8806>.

But <WH3861> after <WH4481> that our fathers <WH2> had provoked <WH7265> the 'Elohim <WH426> of heaven <WH8065> unto wrath <WH7265> <WH8684>, he gave <WH3052> <WH8754> them <WH1994> into the hand <WH3028> of Nebuchadnezzar <WH5020> the king <WH4430> of Babylon <WH895>, the Chaldean <WH3679>, who destroyed <WH5642> <WH8754> this <WH1836> house <WH1005>, and carried <WH1541> the people <WH5972> away <WH1541> <WH8684> into Babylon <WH895>.

But <WH1297> in the first <WH2298> year <WH8140> of Cyrus <WH3567> the king <WH4430> of Babylon <WH895> the same king <WH4430> Cyrus <WH3567> made <WH7761> <WH8754> a decree <WH2942> to build <WH1124> <WH8749> this <WH1836> house <WH1005> of 'Elohim <WH426>.

And the vessels <WH3984> also <WH638> of <WH1768> gold <WH1722> and silver <WH3702> of the house <WH1005> of 'Elohim <WH426>, which Nebuchadnezzar <WH5020> took <WH5312> <WH8684> out of <WH4481> the temple <WH1965> that was in Yerushalayim <WH3390>, and brought <WH2987> <WH8684> them into the temple <WH1965> of Babylon <WH895>, those <WH1994> did Cyrus <WH3567> the king <WH4430> take <WH5312> <WH8684> out of <WH4481> the temple <WH1965> of Babylon <WH895>, and they were delivered <WH3052> <WH8753> unto one, whose name <WH8036> was Sheshbazzar <WH8340>, whom he had made <WH7761> <WH8754> governor <WH6347>;

And said <WH560> <WH8754> unto him, Take <WH5376> <WH8747> these <WH412> vessels <WH3984>, go <WH236> <WH8747>, carry <WH5182> <WH8680> them <WH1994> into the temple <WH1965> that is in Yerushalayim <WH3390>, and let the house <WH1005> of 'Elohim <WH426> be builded <WH1124> <WH8731> in <WH5922> his place <WH870>.

Then <WH116> came <WH858> <WH8754> the same <WH1791> Sheshbazzar <WH8340>, and laid <WH3052> <WH8754> the foundation <WH787> of the house <WH1005> of 'Elohim <WH426> which is in Yerushalayim <WH3390>: and since <WH4481> that time <WH116> even until <WH5705> now <WH3705> hath it been in building <WH1124> <WH8732>, and yet it is not <WH3809> finished <WH8000> <WH8752>.

Now <WH3705> therefore, if <WH2006> it seem good <WH2869> to <WH5922> the king <WH4430>, let there be search <WH1240> <WH8721> made in the king's <WH4430> treasure <WH1596> house <WH1005>, which is there <WH8536> at Babylon <WH895>, whether <WH2006> it be <WH383> so, that a decree <WH2942> was made <WH7761> <WH8752> of <WH4481> Cyrus <WH3567> the king <WH4430> to build <WH1124> <WH8749> this <WH1791> house <WH1005> of 'Elohim <WH426> at Yerushalayim <WH3390>, and let the king <WH4430> send <WH7972> <WH8748> his pleasure <WH7470> to us concerning <WH5922> this matter <WH1836>.
